parameters.description: UpdateContainer (Only accountId and containerId are required.)
parameters.name: updateContainerDto

parameters.description:
Only accountId, hostname and imageAddress are required.
When specifying portBindings, only 'publicPort' OR 'serviceName' is required.
'launchScript' must be base64 encoded (if any).
parameters.name: createContainerDto

get.description: Generates a session token for the specified container and redirects to Speedia OS dashboard (if shouldRedirect is not false).

200.description: If shouldRedirect is set to false, the updated session token is returned.

302.description: A redirect to Speedia OS dashboard (:1618/{containerId}/).

500.description: Container is not found, not running or isn't Speedia OS.

parameters.description: NewContainerProfile (Only name and baseSpecs are required.)
parameters.name: createContainerProfileDto

get.description: Show system information and resource usage.

put.description: Reschedule a task or change its status.

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" + JWT token or API key.
Bearer.name: Authorization
